text:
Dear all, I have a question about for one of my custom module that I plan to use for our marketing email. I have this code in a component:
{{ module.email_headline_field }}
Somehow the image is not showing up in the results but it just shows a broken image link. What would be the reason for this? When I inspect the image it shows like this: alt="header image" beratung="" header="" 2024_final,="" loading="lazy," class="background-image"> Thanks a lot
Dear all, you can ignore the above message I found the reason thank you all :)
Hey <@U06P496Q6LE> - it has to be `{{ module.image_field.src }}`
